Claim: " Adding more CO2 molecules to the atmosphere is similar to painting over a red wall with white paint."
Implication: " Most of the effect of adding CO2 molecules to the atmosphere is achieved with the initial addition."
Referring expressions: CO2 molecules, atmosphere, red wall.  The first coat, white paint, red wall
Formula: (exists a (IsAddedCO2ToAtmosphere(a) and IsPaintedOverRedWallWithWhitePaint(a))) -> (exists b (exists c (IsAddedCO2ToAtmosphere(c) and IsAchievedWithInitialAddition(b))))
